race: Can reroll on rolling a 1 on a d20; must take the second roll
Have advantage to rolls to save against fear effects
Can freely move throw the square of a creature that’s medium or larger
Can hide behind a creature that’s medium or larger
class: Arcane Recovery - 1/day after short rest, regain level/2 of spent spell slots
Conjuration Savant - Gold & time to copy Conjuration spells is halved

Minor Conjuration - Create small inanimate object within 10ft that are <= 3ft on a side & <= 10lbs, nonmagical form, that I've seen. Visibly magical & spreads dim light to 5ft. Lasts for 1hr or until damaged.
feats: Keen Mind - always know which ways is north, always know how many hours until sunset/sunrise, and can accurately recall anything I've seen/heard within the last month

quotes: The path to power is the path of knowledge.
I owe a great debt that I need to pay back.
I speak without thinking about my words.
I do not practice Evocation, Illusion, or Necromancy spells.

2 older siblings, both older, one is an artisan and the other a trapper.
Raised by grandparents - mother died in childbirth and father left afterward.
Had fun & spent most of the time at friends' homes.
Was selected from a group of potential students to be trained.
Made a friend with an adventurer (PC tie in).
Met a powerful being (potential campaign tie in).
Was wrongly accused of the theft of a tome of knowledge and was sent to the service of the crown (campaign tie in).

actions: Beak, melee attack at +4, reach 5ft, one target, for 1 piercing dmg
abilities: Can mimic sounds it's heard. A successful DC 10 Wisdom check is req. to tell the sound is a mimic.
